name: Karim Ratebzad
personality: Disciplined and obedient, with a strong sense of duty and loyalty to his comrades.
story: Mustafa Faruqi grew up in a small village in rural Iran, where he spent most of his childhood working on the family farm. When he turned 18, he joined the Iranian Army and trained as a soldier. After several years of service, he was recruited by the Iranian Revolutionary Guard Corps and sent on various missions in Iraq and Syria. He quickly gained a reputation as a reliable and skilled soldier, earning him the rank of private. Now, as an autorifleman for OPFOR, he continues to serve his country and fight for his beliefs.
